list.title: Newsroom
list.description: Want to know what's cooking in the world of Lonely Planet? Get all the latest media press releases and information here.

list.title: Trade
list.description: If you're a retailer looking to put our products on your shelves, we've got the details and the how-to here.

list.title: Advertising
list.description: Over 11 million monthly visitors come to our award-winning website for inspiration, trusted advice and entertainment. Advertise with Lonely Planet and connect your brand with our vibrant, global community.

list.title: Partnerships
list.description: Lonely Planet has been an essential resource for travellers for over 40 years. Our Business Development team can offer access to our core assets: a massive global audience, a unique range of travel products, and one of the worldâ€™s most iconic and loved travel brands.

list.title: Affiliate program
list.description: Lonely Planet's affiliate program enables you to earn revenue via your website. Joining the program is quick and easy and we are committed to providing a commission well above industry average on every shop sale that your site makes as well as competitive rates on qualified leads for our travel services offering.
